login_failed: Login failed, please check your username and password.
input_empty: Username or Password cannot be empty
password_length_error: The password must be between 6 and 20 characters long
password_only_number_error: A password cannot be made up of numbers alone
password_only_letter_error: Passwords cannot consist of only letters
password_illegal_error: The password can only contain numbers and letters

username_illegal_error: The user name can contain only numbers, letters, underscores (_), and minus (-).
